venue.name: Tufts University Clarence Dussault Track (Ellis Outdoor Oval)

item.description:
9.8 mile bike ride followed by 2 mile run

Start: Tufts University Ellis Outdoor Oval
Ride: From Somerville, into Arlington, around Mystic Lakes, and back to Tufts track
Run: 2 (or more) miles around the Tufts track
Map: http://tinyurl.com/5u...

[PARKING UPDATE: David's warning motivated me to walk around the Tufts Track to figure out where it is safe to park (for non-Somerville residents). David is right - the two major streets immediately around the track (Powder House Blvd & College Ave) require Permit parking. However, Broadway, going west from Powder House Circle toward Teele Square, requires a Parking Permit only between midnight and 6:00 AM. Double check the signs anyway; there's at least one every block on Broadway.]

Park your car on Broadway between Powder House Square and Teele Square. Remember to bring a bike lock and running shoes. We'll meet at the bleachers at the track and start the ride from there. The ride is described in this Google Map. When you finish the ride, grab your bike lock & shoes, lock your bike to the track fence, and start running.

This is a "go at your own pace" brick.

If someone wants to volunteer as the bike route sweeper, we'd all greatly appreciate it.

---

PS: If you're not driving, you can leave your bike lock & shoes on my porch. I live a block from the track. Email me to confirm.
item.how_to_find_us: My bike is a red Viner & I'll be wearing a San Francisco Triathlon Club shirt
item.name: Bike/Run Brick from Davis Square
